title: Bug splat error
body: I cannot connect to games after this recent patch and I keep getting a bug splat error. Need a fix! before leaver buster decides I am quitting.

replies.body: Bugsplat errors can be caused by several factors like outdated drivers or bad game files.  Go through each troubleshooting step in the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to get this fixed up.  Hope that helps!
